name: Hilker-bookmarklet
body:
# hilker-bookmarklet Adds: >LGTM – Good Code Cat™ ![LGTM](https://emoji.slack-edge.com/T024WBZ4E/glasscat/1ba56bc1228df3cf.png)" To the current text field.

The Bookmarklet

LGTM!  ← Drag this to your bookmarks bar.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
